arts.ttl: Hoffenheim's Ilzer and Philipp content after snatching point
arts.sum: Hoffenheim's head coach and goalkeeper expressed their feelings after the 1-1 with VfB Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart left kicking themselves as Hoffenheim snatch late equaliser
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart dominated possession but were held to a 1-1 draw at Hoffenheim, with Nick Woltemade and Gift Orban scoring for their respective sides in an enthralling Bundesliga clash at PreZero Arena. The Hoffenheim goalkeeper made a string of impressive saves, denying Angelo Stiller, Woltemade, and Undav in quick succession to keep his team in the game.

arts.ttl: "It feels like a defeat" - Hoeneß deflated after draw with Hoffenheim
arts.sum: VfB's head coach made his frustration clear after his side squandered the lead against TSG Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart rue missed chances in Hoffenheim draw
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart picked up a frustrating point on the road against Hoffenheim, wondering what could have been had they not missed multiple big chances in the 1-1 draw.

arts.ttl: Germany and VfB Stuttgart star Angelo Stiller reflects on a remarkable 18 months
arts.sum: In an exclusive interview with bundesliga.com, 23-year-old Germany and VfB Stuttgart midfielder Angelo Stiller looks back on his rapid recent development and ahead to a bright future for club and country. I think, as a little boy, you dream of playing one Bundesliga match, and now to have reached triple digits shows that I’ve been on a good path.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. Stuttgart preview: Ilzer's charges targeting back-to-back wins
arts.sum: Hoffenheim will attempt to record back-to-back league victories for the first time this season when they welcome Stuttgart to the PreZero Arena on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Stuttgart - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Stuttgart, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
